snippet: Mike Robles, who has hosted comedy shows around the country, carved his own path to stardom, which started with interviewing strangers and pulling pranks in the Bronx.
abstract: Latino stand-up comedian Mike Robles, who has hosted comedy shows around the country, carved his own path to stardom, which started with interviewing strangers and pulling pranks in the Bronx; Robles encourages young Latinos, rapidly growing group he sees as ill-served by television, to make their own breaks as he did.
lead_paragraph: Mike Robles, who has hosted comedy shows around the country, carved his own path to stardom, which started with interviewing strangers and pulling pranks in the Bronx.

headline.main: Latino Comedian Returns to Where It All Began
headline.print_headline: Latino Comedian Returns To Where It All Began
